articles.author: Karin Strohecker
articles.title: Twenty-four central banks will have digital currencies by 2030 - BIS survey - Reuters
articles.description: Some two dozen central banks across emerging and advanced economies are expected to have digital currencies in circulation by the end of the decade, the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) found in a survey published on Monday.
